```{r}
library(ggplot2)

plotcps <- ggplot(data=atuscps) +
  geom_bar(mapping=aes(x=famincome, fill=home_type)) + 
  xlab("Family Income") +
  ylab("Count") 

plotcps + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 3))
```
